title: Team builder showing up in app
body:
Hey first off LOVE the League chat app and now integration of Match history makes it much more amazing, however I discovered a small issue.

Instead of it saying Normal Draft it says Normal (Teambuilder).

Just something small.

Also can we since we have match history, can we see who was in our game; what roles they played/ who they played and from there add them as a friend??

Thanks!

replies.body:
Since you're leaving feedback and suggestions for League Friends, I strongly recommend reposting this to our [**Mobile App Discussion Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/mobile-app-discussion). ^.^

If you have any other questions, let me know.
